amendment.description: Amendments en bloc removed authorizing language on page 16 dealing with the Highway Trust fund, page 19 dealing with Highway Traffic Safety Grants, page 25 dealing with the Highway Trust Fund, page 55 dealing with Secretary of Transportation oversight activities, and Section 336 dealing with Amtrak and the General Services Administration.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc to remove language of an authorizing nature in specified portions of the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (KY) amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
